entries.label: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
The Dadra And Nagar Haveli And Daman And Diu
Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
Comptroller And Auditor General Of India
Ministry Of Environment,forests and climate change
Ministry Of Consumer Affairs, Food And Public Distribution
Ministry Of Development Of North Eastern Region
Ministry Of Statistics and Programme Implementation
NITI Aayog (National Institution for Transforming India)

fields.schemeName: Special Education And Vocational Training Through Government Institutions
fields.briefDescription: In this scheme, Special Education is provided to children with disability between the age group of 6 to 18 years in the Government Special Schools and Vocational Training is provided to special children above the age of 18 years. Only citizens who are permanent residents of Maharashtra are eligible.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister’s Solar Rooftop Capital Incentive Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Chief Minister’s Solar Rooftop Capital Incentive Scheme is a capital subsidy scheme by the Tamil Nadu Government. In this scheme, a capital subsidy of ₹ 20,000 per kilowatt is provided for grid-connected domestic solar PV systems in addition to the 30% subsidy scheme* of the MNRE.

fields.schemeName: Incentive For The Simple Marriage
fields.briefDescription: The Social Welfare Department of the Government of Karnataka has launched the Simple Marriage scheme, which offers incentives to couples belonging to the SC community. The scheme aims to promote the idea of simple marriages and provide financial assistance to eligible couples.

fields.schemeName: Higher Education And Skill Development Guarantee Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Higher Education and Skill Development Guarantee Scheme Government of NCT of Delhi , has envisaged a Higher Education and Skill Development Guarantee Scheme for students who wish to pursue diploma or degree level courses or specified skill development courses in Delhi.

fields.schemeName: Aponar Apon Ghar
fields.briefDescription: "Aponar Apon Ghar" is a Home Loan Subsidy Scheme by the Finance Department, Govt. of Assam. The objective is to realize the vision of “Housing For All” by 2022 so that each poor person may have their own house. All the applicants will get home loans at subsidized interest rates.

fields.schemeName: KSCSTE Research Fellowship
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “KSCSTE Research Fellowship” is for encouraging enthusiastic and passionate post-graduate science/ engineering students by supporting them financially in their Ph.D. studies.

fields.schemeName: Delhi Arogya Kosh
fields.briefDescription: "Delhi Arogya Kosh” (DAK) provides Financial assistance to needy eligible patients for treatment of any illness/treatment/intervention required by the patient undergoing treatment in a Government Hospital run by Delhi Government or Central Government or Autonomous Hospital under the State Government

fields.schemeName: LIDCOM Margin Money Loan Scheme
fields.briefDescription: In this scheme, for a loan limit from ₹50,001 to ₹5,00,000/-, 20% of the Project cost loan as Seed Capital is paid by the Corporation @ 4% interest per annum. A maximum of ₹10,000/- will be paid as a subsidy by Corporation. A 5% amount of project cost will have to be contributed by the beneficiary.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
fields.schemeName: PM Vishwakarma
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "PM Vishwakarma " by the Ministry of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, is a new scheme that envisages providing end-to-end holistic support to traditional artisans and craftspeople in scaling up their conventional products and services.

fields.schemeName: SERB Research Scientist Scheme
fields.briefDescription: SERB Board has launched a new ‘SERB Research Scientist (SRS) Scheme’ for the awardees of INSPIRE Faculty and Ramanujan Fellowships, who fail to secure regular positions after completion of the regular tenure of five years in the respective schemes.

fields.schemeName: Post Graduate Merit Scholarship Scheme For University Rank Holders At Under-Graduate Level Applicable
fields.briefDescription: UGC, Dept. of Higher Education introduced a Post-Graduate Merit Scholarship Scheme for University rank holders both in General and Honours Courses at the UG level. The scholarship may be tenable for a period of two years.

fields.schemeName: Karmaveer Padmashri Dadasaheb Gaikwad Birth Centenary And Prize Distribution
fields.briefDescription: The "Karmaveer Padmashri Dadasaheb Gaikwad Birth Centenary and Prize Distribution" is an award by the Govt. of Maharashtra. The award is given to individuals and organizations working for the social movement against traditional customs and untouchability and for landless farm workers.

fields.schemeName: Mukhya Mantri Hamari Betiyan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Mukhya Mantri Hamari Betiyan Yojana was launched in 2015-16 by centre under the secondary education department for the benefit of girls in their education.

fields.schemeName: LIDCOM 50% Subsidy Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "50% Subsidy Scheme" is a scheme by LIDCOM, Govt. of Maharashtra. In this scheme, 50% amount is being given as a subsidy on a maximum loan amount of ₹50,000/-. The subsidy is subject to the maximum limit of ₹10,000/-. The bank charge of interest is as per the existing rate.

fields.schemeName: Savitribai Phule Scholarship For V.J.N.T. And S.B.C. Girl Students Studying In 5th To 7th Standard
fields.briefDescription: Savitribai Phule Scholarship is a Scholarship Scheme by the Social Justice and Special Assistance Dept., Govt. of Maharashtra, to encourage the enrollment and to decrease the dropout ratio of Girl Students of Maharashtra from Vimukta Jati and Nomadic Tribes and Special Backward Classes.

fields.schemeName: Incentive Award For Marriage With Disabled Person
fields.briefDescription: "Incentive Award for Marriage with Disabled Person" is a Grant by the Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur. In this scheme, incentive is granted to a person who marries a Person with Disability. This is a State Sponsored Scheme. Only the citizens who are domicile of Manipur can apply.

fields.schemeName: Chikitsa Pratipoorti Yojana
fields.briefDescription: "Chikitsa Pratipoorti Yojana" is a scheme by the Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development Govt of Jharkhand. The scheme provides financial assistance to the Registered Workers for the treatment of serious illnesses (cancer, heart disease, kidney disease, etc.

fields.schemeName: Nagaland State Merit Scholarship
fields.briefDescription: The Directorate of Higher Education has launched the Nagaland State Merit Scholarship for the students of classes from 11th to 12th and UG Degree to PG degree so that they will be able to secure their scholarship rights or seats after getting online registration under this scholarship.

fields.schemeName: Uttar Pradesh Old Age Pension Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Government of Uttar Pradesh has introduced an old-age pension scheme for the benefit of the senior citizens in the state. Under this scheme, eligible senior citizens will be provided with financial assistance in the form of a monthly pension.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance For Persons With Special Needs
fields.briefDescription: Financial Assistance for Persons with Special Needs (Disability Pension) is the welfare scheme of the Delhi Govt of NCTD to provide assistance to Disabled Persons.

fields.schemeName: Chief Ministers Special Rural Development Fund (CMSRDF)
fields.briefDescription: The primary objective of the program is to generate wage employment and creation of socially and economically useful public assets by involving peoples participation at the grassroots level. The schemes undertaken in the program are varied in nature and are selected by the MLA and NGOs.

fields.schemeName: Unemployment Allowance To The Educated Unemployed Persons With Disabilities
fields.briefDescription: "Unemployment Allowance to the Educated Unemployed Persons With Disabilities" is a Financial Assistance Scheme by the Govt. of Manipur. The payment of unemployment allowance will be applicable to all categories of disabilities except Intellectual Disabilities as specified in RoPwD Act 2016.

fields.schemeName: Merit Cum Means Linked Financial Assistance Scheme
fields.briefDescription: It is the policy of the Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi that students get access to high quality higher education provided by Delhi State Universities irrespective of their caste, creed, economic background, or gender.

fields.schemeName: Group Supply Of Goats And Sheep
fields.briefDescription: Group supply of goats and sheep refers to the practice of selling or distributing goats and sheep in groups, rather than as individual animals. In Maharashtra, this practice is common among farmers, livestock traders, and cooperative organizations.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Kanya Abhibhawak Pension Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Government of Madhya Pradesh has launched a scheme entitled “Mukhyamantri Kanya Abhibhavak Pension Yojana” on 01 April 201,  for the welfare of citizens having one daughter.

fields.schemeName: Saraswati Cycle Yojana
fields.briefDescription:
Chhattisgarh Saraswati Cycle Yojana has been started by the Government of Chhattisgarh in 2004. 
Saraswati Cycle Yojana is being operated by the Department of School Education, Government of Chhattisgarh.

fields.schemeName: Merit Awards
fields.briefDescription: In the "Merit Awards" scheme, awards are given to the students with disability who rank 1st, 2nd, and 3rd among disabled students in the Secondary School Certificate (S.S.C.) and Higher Secondary Certificate (H.S.C.)  in their respective divisional boards of education.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister Ekal Nari Samman Pension Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The Rajasthan State government started the "Chief Minister Ekal Nari Samman Pension Yojana" scheme for women's support and empowerment.

fields.schemeName: Sarothi Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Sarothi Start-Up fund is an initiative that the Indian government of Assam has launched (2016-17) to encourage innovation and entrepreneurship in the state. Startups and entrepreneurs receive seed capital, working capital, and other forms of financial support through the scheme.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance To Dependent Children Of Widows And Destitute Women
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Financial Assistance To Dependent Children of Widows And Destitute Women" is a Social Welfare scheme by the Dept. of Social Welfare, Women & Child Development, Govt. of Chandigarh; to extend financial assistance (₹ 1000/- per month per child) to children who are fatherless or orphan.

fields.schemeName: Subsidy Scheme On Establishment Of 40 R.I.R. Birds Unit For Divyang People
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Subsidy Scheme on Establishment of 40 R.I.R. Birds Unit for Divyang People” was launched by the Dept. of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Govt. of Gujarat to provide employment, nutritious diet and to raise the income of Divyang People of the society of Gujarat State.

fields.schemeName: Old Age Assistance
fields.briefDescription: Old Age Assistance or Pension is a welfare scheme of Delhi Govt to provide assistance to Old age needy persons. The primary goal of this scheme is to offer eligible senior citizens financial help in the form of monthly pensions.

fields.schemeName: Shri Vajpayee Bankable Yojana
fields.briefDescription: A scheme for providing financial assistance to the craftsmen of Cottage Industries through Nationalised Banks, Cooperative banks, Public sector Banks or Private Banks.

fields.schemeName: Him Kukkut Palan Yojna
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Him Kukkut Palan Yojna” was launched by the Department of Animal Husbandry, Government of Himachal Pradesh to provide the subsidy to the entrepreneurs/farmers who are interested and engaged in poultry farming in the state.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister Arogya Arunachal Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to accord quality and cashless healthcare services to the indigenous people of the state and government employees and reduce out-of-pocket (OOP) expenses during major illness and hospitalization, thereby envisaging universal healthcare for all sections of society.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister’s UPSC Combined Civil Services Coaching Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh started the scheme “Chief Minister’s UPSC Combined Civil Services Coaching Scheme” to promote the local Arunachal Pradesh Schedule Tribe (APST) candidates to compete in National Competitive Examination being conducted by the UPSC.

fields.schemeShortTitle: GRANTS IN AID TO SC/ST PATIENTS
fields.schemeName: Financial Grants In Aid To SC/ST Patients Suffering From Cancer And Other Malignant Diseases
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Financial Grants in Aid to SC/ST patients suffering from cancer and other malignant diseases” was launched by the Government of Assam in 2017 to provide financial assistance in the form of grants in Aid to SC/ST patients who are suffering from cancer and other malignant diseases.

fields.schemeName: Krushak Assistance For Livelihood And Income Augmentation
fields.briefDescription: Through the implementation of Krushak Assistance for Livelihood and Income Augmentation - KALIA Scheme , the State Government aims to lend farmers with an all inclusive and flexible support system, ensuring accelerated agricultural prosperity.

fields.schemeName: AGR 3 (Farm Mechanization) Scheme For ST Farmers
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “AGR 3 (Farm Mechanization) Scheme for ST Farmers” was started by the Department of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Sanjay Gandhi Niradhar Grant Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Sanjay Gandhi Niradhar Grant Scheme" is a scheme by the Dept. of Social Justice & Special Assistance, Govt. of Maharashtra. Financial assistance of ₹600/- per month is given if there is only one beneficiary in the eligible family, and ₹900/- per month if there is one beneficiary in a family.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Grant of Additional Scholarship to the Students Belonging to Scheduled Tribes of Andaman and Nicobar Islands for Pursuing Higher Studies Anywhere in India Post-Senior Secondary Courses (Post 10+2 Courses)
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to provide additional financial assistance (scholarship) to the ST students pursuing higher education after Senior Secondary i.e. 12th Standard in the Colleges/Universities anywhere in India, as an incentive to supplement the cost of their education.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Rashtriya Parivar Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: This scheme is being executed for the family members who are unable to make their livelihood after the death of the primary breadwinner of the family.

fields.schemeName: Godhan Nyay Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Godhan Nyay Yojana is a scheme launched by the Government of Chhattisgarh on 20 July 2020. Under this scheme, cow dung will be purchased by the state government from the cattle-rearing farmers.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Aadharbhut Shiksha Prashikshan Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Mukhyamantri Aadharbhut Shiksha Prashikshan Sahayata Yojana" for Building and other construction worker on 29 March 2023.

fields.schemeName: Technical Education Scholarship Scheme For Degree Level
fields.briefDescription: The Scholarships will be awarded to the P.G. Courses/Degree Courses level Courses in Engineering/Technology including Architecture or any other equivalent course approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).

fields.schemeName: Development of Choir Industries
fields.briefDescription: The Government of Puducherry introduced the Scheme Development Of Choir Industries to promote and develop Coir and Coir based industry in the Union territory of Puducherry.

fields.schemeName: Scholarship For Differently Abled Students
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Scholarship for Differently Abled Students” was launched by the Department of Social Justice, Government of Kerala.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Fresh Water Aquaculture Farms
fields.briefDescription: “Financial Assistance to Fresh Water Aquaculture Farms” is a scheme by the Dept. of Fisheries, Govt. of Goa. Through this scheme, financial assistance is provided to eligible fishermen for the construction and renovation of the Farm, for the purchase of farming equipment, and the purchase of feed.

fields.schemeName: Rehabilitation Allowance To Lepers
fields.briefDescription: The Himachal Pradesh Rehabilitation Allowance to Lepers is a social welfare scheme initiated by the Government of Himachal Pradesh in India to provide financial assistance to people affected by leprosy.

fields.schemeName: Widow Pension - Uttar Pradesh
fields.briefDescription: Widow pension in Uttar Pradesh is a social welfare scheme by the Government of Uttar Pradesh to provide financial assistance to widows residing in the state. The scheme is administered by the Women Welfare Department of the state government.

fields.schemeName: Tripura Pension Scheme For Providing Pension To The Retired Home Guard / Women Home Guard Volunteers
fields.briefDescription: Effective from 1st December 2012, this is a pension scheme for the Retired Home Guard / Women Home Guard Volunteers. The Rate of Pension shall be ₹750 per head per month (without any allowances whatsoever). Arrears shall not be payable.

fields.schemeName: Back Ended Interest Subsidy (BEIS)
fields.briefDescription: "Back Ended Interest Subsidy" by the Govt of Tamil Nadu, is introduced with the objective of reducing financial burdens of all new micro and small manufacturing enterprises who have already availed loans from banks/ other government organizations by assisting them through a subsidy on term loans.

fields.schemeName: IGSTC Industrial Fellowship- PhD Industrial Exposure Fellowship
fields.briefDescription: The Indo-German Science & Technology Centre (IGSTC) Industrial Fellowship Programme was launched by Secretary, Department of Science and Technology, Govt. of India on the occasion of IGSTC’s 11th Foundation Day on 14th June 2021 to support young Indian researchers for industrial exposure in Germany.

fields.schemeName: Shreshtam Scheme For Ensuring Participation Of PwDs In Arts & Sports
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Shreshtam Scheme for Ensuring Participation of PwDs in Arts & Sports” was launched by the Department of Social Justice, Government of Kerala.

fields.schemeName: Vidyakiranam Scheme-Educational Assistance To Children Of Disabled Parents
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Vidyakiranam Scheme-Educational Assistance to Children of Disabled Parents” was launched by the Department of Social Justice, Government of Kerala.

fields.schemeName: SEBI ITD Internship Program
fields.briefDescription: The SEBI ITD Internship Program provides hands-on training to the students of the institutes based in and around Mumbai. The program accepts up to 15 interns. The Interns accepted under this program would be given an opportunity to work on different Information Technology (IT) projects.

fields.schemeName: Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana - National Rural Livelihoods Mission
fields.briefDescription: DAY-NRLM is the flagship program of MoRD for promoting poverty reduction through building strong institutions for the poor, particularly women, and enabling these institutions to access a range of financial services and livelihoods. States are enabled to formulate their poverty reduction plans.

fields.schemeName: Internship Scheme Of Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO)
fields.briefDescription: The Internship Scheme of Employees’ Provident Fund Organization invites applications for Internships from students for engagement as “Interns” with EPFO. The “Interns” shall have an opportunity to know about the EPFO’s functioning and Departmental Policy issues in EPFO and Government of India.

fields.schemeName: Post Graduate Scholarship Scheme for GATE/GPAT Qualified Students-AICTE
fields.briefDescription: AICTE in order to ensure the development of technical education in India awards Post Graduate Scholarship of ₹12,400/- per month to full-time GATE/CEED qualified students admitted to AICTE approved post-graduate programs in AICTE approved Institutions/University Dept. as per AICTE approved intake.

fields.schemeName: Interest Subsidy Scheme for Smaller Business Units
fields.briefDescription: Launched in 2018, the "Internet Subsidy Scheme" is one of the "Information Technology Policy Schemes" by the Department of Information Technology, Government of Goa. The objective and the scope of this scheme is to provide Internet Subsidy to the eligible Information Technology Units in Goa.

fields.schemeName: Uttar Pradesh Mukhyamantri Bal Seva Yojana (Genearal)
fields.briefDescription: "Uttar Pradesh Mukhyamantri Bal Seva Yojana (General)" scheme provides financial assistance to children in Uttar Pradesh who face various hardships.

fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana
fields.briefDescription: Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana was launched by the Department of Pharmaceuticals, in November 2008. Under the scheme, dedicated outlets known as Janaushadhi Kendras are opened to make quality generic medicines available to all at affordable prices.

fields.schemeName: Prerana (micro Credit Finance) Scheme
fields.briefDescription: DR. BR Ambedkar Development Corporation has launched the Prerana scheme in which Scheduled Caste/ Scheduled Tribe Women Self Help Groups will be financed by mass production / service units. For a group of 10 members, Rs. 2,50,000 / – will be allowed. Rs. 15,000 /- subsidy Rs. 10,000/- Margin Money.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister’s Startup/innovation Projects/new Industries
fields.briefDescription: The HP CM Startup Scheme aims to turn the educated youth from job seekers to job creators. This scheme will give support to the “Startup” and Innovation Projects in the state and will provide skills to the youth and potential investors to develop entrepreneurship.

fields.schemeName: Gopabandhu Sikhya Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The "Gopabandhu Sikhya Sahayata Yojana" scheme was launched as an endeavor to make higher education inclusive and to increase the gross enrollment ratio. The scheme aims to further widen access to higher education for students belonging to underprivileged sections of society.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance To Poor & Needy Widow Women
fields.briefDescription: "Financial Assistance to Poor & Needy Widow Women" is a scheme by the Department of Social Welfare, Govt. of Manipur. The objective of the scheme is to provide social security by way of financial assistance to widows in the age group of 18-40 years.

fields.schemeName: Chief Ministergi Artistesinggi Tengbang (CMAT): Support For Purchase Of Instruments / Equipment
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "CMAT: Support for Purchase of Instruments / Equipment" aims to support many talented students and budding artistes, who are economically well but in need of instruments/equipment for their learning and performance purpose to help them groom towards professionalism.

fields.schemeName: Janta Juth Accidental Insurance Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "Janta Juth" is a Farmer's Accidental Insurance Scheme by the Govt. of Gujarat to provide economic assistance of upto ₹ 2,00,000 to Farmers in case of Death or Disability. The objective is to assist the successor of the farmer in case of death or disability due to an accident.

fields.schemeName: Funeral Assistance (CBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, financial assistance shall be given to the legal heirs, in case of death of registered workers under the CBOCWWB.

fields.schemeName: WISE Fellowship for Ph.D.
fields.briefDescription: The "WISE Fellowship for Ph.D. (WISE-PhD)" of the Department of Science and Technology aims to provide an opportunity to carry out Doctoral research in basic and applied sciences to women scientists and technologists between the age group of 27-45 years who want to pursue research in STEM fields.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance for the Purchase of Sewing Machine (CBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, financial assistance will be given to the spouse of registered male construction workers or female construction workers for purchase of sewing machine, once in life time.

fields.schemeName: Scholarship to the Ward of Beneficiary (CBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, financial assistance in the form of scholarship shall be granted to the children/wards of workers who are registered under the CBOCWWB on the basis of the percentage of marks obtained in 10th, 12th & Graduation.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance for Purchase of Spectacles, Denture, Hearing Aid (CBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, financial assistance shall be granted to the workers who are registered under the CBOCWWB for the purchase of Spectacles, Denture and Hearing Aid.

fields.schemeName: Biju Patnaik Sports Award for Outstanding Performance in Sports and Games for the Year
fields.briefDescription: The award is given to the sportspersons of Odisha who have achieved outstanding performance in any of the recognized sports during the year making the State of Odisha and India proud.

fields.schemeName: Interest Free Loan (CBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, interest free loan shall be granted to the registered construction workers of the Board for the purchase of items like Fridge, Television/ LCD, Motor Cycle/Scooter, Cooler, Fan & Bicycle.

fields.schemeName: AICTE-ISTE INDUCTION/REFRESHER PROGRAMME SCHEME
fields.briefDescription: AICTE-ISTE Induction/ Refresher Programme provide financial assistance to AICTE approved institutions/universities in conducting training for the teaching faculties working in technical institutions.

fields.schemeName: Supply of Dhotis and Sarees to Scheduled Caste (SC) People
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Supply of Dhotis and Sarees to Scheduled Caste (SC) People” by the Adi Dravidar Welfare and Scheduled Tribes Welfare Department, Union Territory of Puducherry is introduced to provide clothing items (lungi, shirt, saree, blouse, etc) to the Scheduled Caste (SC) people of Puducherry.

fields.schemeName: Free Supply of Sarees and Dhothies to the Poor People
fields.briefDescription: The scheme was introduced to provide two sets of clothing items to poor people (other than SC/Fisherman) once in a year as a measure of Social Security. The beneficiaries are identified based on the data from the Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs Department in Puducherry.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Old Age Pensioner Suffering From TB/ Cancer
fields.briefDescription: “Financial Assistance to Old Age Pensioner Suffering From TB/ Cancer” by the Dept of Women & Child Development, Govt of Puducherry, was introduced to extend a helping hand by way of financial assistance to Old Age/Destitute Pensioners who are suffering from TB/Cancer to meet the medical expenses.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Pensioners Suffering From HIV and AIDS
fields.briefDescription: “Financial Assistance to Pensioners Suffering From HIV/AIDS” is a Social Security Scheme by the Department of Women, Child Development & Social Security, Government of Jharkhand which aims to provide social security through financial assistance to those persons who are suffering from HIV/AIDS.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Scheduled Castes for Funeral Rites
fields.briefDescription: “Financial Assistance to Scheduled Castes for Funeral Rites” was introduced by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Department, Government of Puducherry. The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to the Scheduled Caste family for performing funeral rites of their deceased family member.

fields.schemeName: Shauchalaya Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The "Shauchalaya Sahayata Yojana" is a scheme by the government of Uttar Pradesh, India, to provide financial assistance to registered construction workers to build toilets in their homes.

fields.schemeName: Promotion Of Intensive Aquaculture Through Introduction Of Bio-floc Technology During The Year 2021-22
fields.briefDescription: The government of Odisha introduced Bio-floc-based farming and aims to promote sustainable intensification of freshwater fish and brackish water shrimp farming for boosting productivity and generating high income in a limited area.

fields.schemeName: West Bengal Freeship Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The West Bengal Freeship Scheme (WBFS)has been launched by the Department of Higher Education,  Government of West Bengal. This freeship would be provided as a tuition fee waiver for the under Graduate students level in Engineering & Technology/ Pharmacy/ Architecture.

fields.schemeName: Atal Shresth Shahar Yojna
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to reward and incentivize the best performing Urban Local Bodies (ULBs) in Himachal Pradesh (Municipal Council/Nagar Panchyat) on the indicators of sanitations/cleanliness, increase utilization, public infrastructure and official work.

fields.schemeName: Maternity Benefit (A.B.O.C.W.W.B)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Maternity Benefit” was started by the Assam Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (A.B.O.C.W.W.B), Labour Welfare Department, Government of Assam for providing financial assistance to the registered women beneficiaries as maternity benefits during the period of maternity.

fields.schemeName: Marriage Assistance (A.B.O.C.W.W.B)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Marriage Assistance” was started by the Assam Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (A.B.O.C.W.W.B), Labour Welfare Department, Government of Assam for providing financial assistance to the registered construction workers for the marriage of their children.

fields.schemeName: Kisan Vikas Patra Scheme
fields.briefDescription: ‘Kisan Vikas Patra Scheme’ was relaunched in the year 2014 by the Department of Economic Affairs, Ministry Of Finance, Government of India in view of the popular demand and to revitalize Small Savings. The amount invested in Kisan Vikas Patra (KYP) doubles in 115 months at the present rate.

fields.schemeName: Spices Development Ginger, Turmeric, Black Pepper, Cardamom, Coriander, Cinnamon and Chillies
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to encourage farmers to produce good quality and diseased-free planting materials and to grow improved varieties of high-yielding spices.

fields.schemeName: Tuber Crops Potato, Tapioca, Colocasia
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to boost up production and productivity of potato per unit area by providing quality HYV seeds, and equipment at a 50% subsidy.

fields.schemeName: Grant of Financial Assistance to Differently Abled Person
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Grant of Financial Assistance to Differently Abled Person” by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry was introduced to provide monthly financial assistance to Persons with Disability to maintain their minimum standard of living.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
fields.schemeName: Consortia & Tender Marketing Scheme
fields.briefDescription:
Micro & Small Enterprise in their Individual Capacity faces problems to procure and execute large order, which inhibit and
restrict their growth. NSIC accordingly, adopts Consortia approach and forms consortia of units manufacturing the same
products, thereby easing out marketing problems of MSEs.

fields.schemeName: Funeral Assistance (A.B.O.C.W.W.B)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, financial assistance shall be given to the nominees/dependents of a deceased registered worker, towards funeral expenses.

fields.schemeName: Home for the Aged and Infirm
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Home for the Aged and Infirm" was launched by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry. The objective of this scheme is to cater to the needs of persons who are aged/infirm, i.e. senior citizens, both male and female above the age of 60 years from BPL Family.

fields.schemeName: Government Special School for the Visually Handicapped and the Hearing Impaired
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Government Special School for the Visually Handicapped and the Hearing Impaired” by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry, was introduced to facilitate the education and self-confidence development of visually impaired and hearing-impaired children.

fields.schemeName: Prime Minister’s Scholarship Scheme for the Wards of Central Armed Police Forces & Assam Rifles
fields.briefDescription: The scheme was introduced by the Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India from the academic year 2006-07 to encourage higher technical & professional education for the dependent wards & widows of Central Armed Police Forces & Assam Rifles (CAPFs & AR) Personnel.

fields.schemeName: Grant of Fuel Subsidy to Differently Abled Persons Who Are Owning Motorised Vehicles
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Grant of Fuel Subsidy to Differently Abled Persons Who Are Owning Motorised Vehicles” by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry was introduced to provide a subsidy of upto 50 % of the cost of fuel to persons with disability who own motorised vehicles.

fields.schemeName: Grant of Transport Allowance to Differently Abled Persons
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Grant of Transport Allowance to Differently Abled Persons" was launched by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry. In this scheme, a fixed sum ₹ 300/- per month shall be paid as Transport Allowance to the differently abled individuals.

fields.schemeName: Free Distribution of Rice to Differently Abled Persons
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Free Distribution of Rice to Differently Abled Persons” by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry was introduced to distribute 15 Kg of rice per month or equivalent Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) to the differently abled persons.

fields.schemeName: Development of Strawberry Cultivation
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to provide farmers with quality and improved varieties of strawberry planting materials so as to encourage area expansion under this crop such that commercialization horticulture under this crop is achieved.
